info.name: Ilias HHN Dark-Blue
info.description: A Dark Blue Theme for Ilias Only for HHN
info.additionalInfo: ~~ 2021/12/15 ~~ 【 released version 1.2.1 】 ◉ added round borders on logo ~~ 2021/12/14 ~~ 【 released version 1.2 】 ◉ added more readable color in mini calender ◉ changed colors for infoboxes ◉ fixed hover color in mini calender ~~ 2021/12/13 ~~ 【 released version 1.1.1 】 ◉ fixed information boxes in scripts ~~ 2021/12/09 ~~ 【 released version 1.1 】 ◉ added support for wiki editing ◉ added modern look to info boxes ◉ changed wiki colors ◉ changed section color ◉ fixed highlights in text ◉ fixed info boxes ◉ fixed wiki comment section ◉ fixed footer (finally) ~~ 2021/12/08 ~~ 【 released version 1.0 】 ◉ NEW! added custom scroll bar ◉ NEW! added rounded corners ◉ NEW! added glassy design ◉ many things more! ◉ changed the color pattern to something better to read ◉ fixed a LOT of bugs and formats ~~ 2021/12/08 ~~ 【 released version 0.0.5 】 ◉ fixed dropdown menu font color ~~ 2021/12/07 ~~ 【 released version 0.0.4 】 ◉ fixed colors ◉ changed colors in titles to purple ~~ 2021/12/07 ~~ 【 released version 0.0.3 】 ◉ added news feed ◉ added calender views ◉ added new styles in lern sequences ◉ fixed some containers ~~ 2021/12/07 ~~ 【 released version 0.0.2 】 ◉ added profile view ~~ 2021/12/07 ~~ 【 released version 0.0.1 】 ◉ added the theme ◉ TODO: there are still some things missing!
